stimulusHtml: Despite their origins in two different religious traditions, the statue of the Buddha at Todai-ji and the Shiva as Lord of Dance (Nataraja) both convey meaning through the use of
choicesHtml: iconography that focuses on the role of destruction in the cycle of life
dynamic poses that suggest the power within the sculpture
huge size that was intended to inspire awe as well as spiritual unity
hand gestures that invite viewers to come forward without fear
